name: LumiShare
description: LumiShare is a Real World Asset (RWA) tokenization platform designed to unlock capital for renewable energy projects through blockchain technology. By issuing asset-backed tokens, LumiShare enables both institutional and individual investors to participate in high-quality green infrastructure deals, with investments starting as low as $500. The platform serves as a bridge between vetted solar and renewable energy developers and global investors, offering a seamless, transparent, and efficient investment process. Each listed project undergoes rigorous due diligence and verification, ensuring it meets strict financial, technical, legal, and ESG (Environmental, Social, Governance) standards. What sets LumiShare apart is its use of on-chain verified ESG data, AI-powered risk assessment, and non-custodial investment tools, allowing investors to maintain control of their assets while gaining access to clear insights and lower-risk opportunities. This modern infrastructure brings unprecedented transparency and accessibility to the traditionally opaque and exclusive world of energy finance - democratizing climate investing and accelerating the global transition to renewable energy.
